title: Cozy Cottage Beef Stew Soup
directions: In a slow cooker, combine beef, onions, garlic, celery, carrots, green beans, mushrooms, and potatoes. Pour in the tomatoes and tomato sauce. Season with bay leaf, pepper, thyme, and marjoram. Stir together chicken broth and flour. Pour chicken broth mixture and beef consomme into slow cooker, and stir.
Cover, and cook on Low 6 to 10 hours. Remove bay leaf before serving.
ingredients: ¾ pound beef stew meat, cut into 1 inch cubes
¼ pound green beans, cut into 1 inch pieces
